colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS MA GTZUG TOR DKAR MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG NOM CHE NANG SO NGAG DBANG SBYIN PAS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, RDO RJE 'CHANG DBANG SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I ZLOS GAR BSGYUR BA RJE BTZUN RDO RJE 'CHANG DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES MTSAN YONGS SU GRAGS PA DE NYID KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA BKA' DRIN GYI CUNG ZAD MNOS PA, BYANGS PHYOGS SOG PO'I YUL 'DIR 'KHYAMS PA PHYOGS MED BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
